alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 1:39PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson and southeastern Boulder Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 139 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles east of Pinecliffe, or 25 miles northwest of Denver, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Arvada, Boulder, Louisville, Wallstreet, Salina, Crisman, Eldorado Springs, Sunshine and Pinecliffe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for central and northeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet
